answers.answer: Hi love I was in the same situation except I have gestational diabetes and my baby had a hole in his brain. Im 28 weeks and the whole pregnancy has been high risk. I see 3 different. It is stressful but you gotta remain calm and pray. I prayed and prayed. Last week I went to my specialist and it's a miracle my baby hole in his brain closed up. Stay positive dear.
Omg thank you, this calms me down.much more..thank you for your response and Sharing your story
No problem, just sit back and enjoy all the extra ultrasounds you get :)

question: First off, I just found out im TEAM PINK!Second to get to the stressful part, my doc said I have high blood pressure, and in the ultra sound picture my daughter has a hole in her spine? He said good thing is that he found it now that im only 19 weeks 6 days so it can be cured..now hes sending me to a high risk pregnancy clinic to get checked every week..how am I suppose to remain calm? Ive never heard of this before...has anybody had this happen to them? Im scared because he said im considered high risk now because of the high blood pressure and babys spine
title: omg how can I not stress?!
